vlive.korean: 왜냐면 Crayon Pop의 선망이 들어가 있다고 들었거든요. Because I heard this song contains some dreams of Crayon Pop. 듣기 View video CRAYONPOP : 크레용팝 [ Crayonpop Evolution Vol_1 ] ShowCase
vlive.english: Because I heard this song contains some dreams of Crayon Pop.

examples.korean: They were envious of his success. 발음듣기 그들은 그의 성공을 선망했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They were envious of his success. 발음

examples.korean: He saw the envious look in the other boy’s eyes. 발음듣기 그는 상대방 소년의 눈에서 선망 어린 표정을 보았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He saw the envious look in the other boy’s eyes. 발음

examples.korean: They looked with envy at her latest purchase. 발음듣기 그들은 그녀가 최근에 입수한 물건을 선망 어린 시선으로 바라보았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They looked with envy at her latest purchase. 발음

examples.korean: The grid reference is C8. 발음듣기 참고 기준선망은 C8이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The grid reference is C8. 발음

examples.korean: Her new dress was the envy of(=an object of envy to) all. 발음듣기 그녀의 새 드레스는 모두의 선망의 대상이었다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Her new dress was the envy of(=an object of envy to) all. 발음
